name: React
description: 用于构建用户界面的 JavaScript 库。React 通过基于组件的架构，让创建交互式 UI 变得简单而高效。
descriptionEn: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces. React makes it easy to create interactive UIs with a component-based architecture.

name: VS Code
description: 轻量但功能强大的源代码编辑器，内置调试、Git 控制和扩展支持。适合各类编程语言开发。
descriptionEn: Lightweight but powerful source code editor with built-in debugging, Git control, and extension support. Perfect for all programming languages.

name: Figma
description: 协作式界面设计工具，在浏览器中运行。非常适合设计用户界面、原型制作和团队协作。
descriptionEn: Collaborative interface design tool that runs in the browser. Perfect for UI design, prototyping, and team collaboration.

name: Notion
description: 集笔记、文档、维基和项目管理于一体的全能工作空间。优雅地组织你的工作和生活。
descriptionEn: All-in-one workspace for notes, docs, wikis, and project management. Organize your work and life elegantly.

name: Tailwind CSS
summary: 实用优先的 CSS 框架
description: 实用优先的 CSS 框架，可快速构建自定义用户界面。高度可定制且易于使用。
descriptionEn: Utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces. Highly customizable and easy to use.

name: Blender
description: 免费开源的 3D 创作套件。支持完整的 3D 流程：建模、绑定、动画、模拟、渲染、合成和动作跟踪。
descriptionEn: Free and open-source 3D creation suite. Supports the entire 3D pipeline: modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing, and motion tracking.

name: Khan Academy
description: 免费在线课程、课程和练习，涵盖数学、科学等。通过数千个视频和练习免费学习。
descriptionEn: Free online courses, lessons, and practice covering math, science, and more. Learn for free with thousands of videos and exercises.

name: OBS Studio
description: 免费开源的视频录制和直播软件。非常适合内容创作者和主播使用。
descriptionEn: Free and open-source software for video recording and live streaming. Perfect for content creators and streamers.

name: 7-Zip
description: 免费开源的文件压缩工具，压缩比极高。支持多种压缩格式。
descriptionEn: Free and open-source file archiver with high compression ratio. Supports multiple compression formats.

name: Git
description: 免费开源的分布式版本控制系统，设计用于高效处理从小到大的各种项目。
descriptionEn: Free and open-source distributed version control system designed to handle projects of all sizes with speed and efficiency.

name: GIMP
description: GNU 图像处理程序。免费开源的光栅图形编辑器，用于图像处理和编辑。
descriptionEn: GNU Image Manipulation Program. Free and open-source raster graphics editor for image retouching and editing.

name: Audacity
description: 免费开源的跨平台音频软件，用于录制和编辑声音。易于使用且功能强大。
descriptionEn: Free and open-source cross-platform audio software for recording and editing sounds. Easy to use yet powerful.
